About Me

BIO

This is my website.Being in love with technology my whole life, I am working to be a part of IT industry. In 2019 I graduated from Global Engineering College affiliated by RGPV and recognized by AICTE.I am teaching myself game development using platforms like Udemy and Youtube.

Gamer

As a kid, I was mesmerized by Mario hoping over obstacles in order to save the princess, as an adult I am still amazed at the 16-bit character jumping and even fighting fire breathing dragons just through clicking of a button. As the gaming industry evolved from bits to complex open world RPGs and games like Witcher 3 and Red Dead Redemption, I find myself doe-eyed and mesmerized, only to realize, I want to be a part of this industry.

Media Lover.

Movies,Television shows are not only great form of entertainment but also gives you different perspectives in life. From Lion King(1994) to as recent as Avengers Endgame we've come a long way in terms of technology and combining it with a good story telling and character development makes it an incredible experience.Browsing through Youtube I found a channel called "Our Stupid Reactions" and in one of the video found my favourite quote "You're not teachable if you're not humble. The greatest attribute of a human being is humility. Cause every other good quality comes from being humble" - Rick Segall.

Interests.

I am so grateful for each and every experience that life has to offer me. I am right there documenting these amazing moments. I started photography 5-6 years ago and now i love it as a hobby. In school i was part of a western choir that came 3rd in inter-school state level competition and 1st in inter-school city level competition and can say music is a big part of my life. As someone who loves Sports I follow Cricket and Football.Lifelong fan of FC Barcelona. Avid follower of La Liga, the UEFA Champions League, and world football and also Indian national cricket team.
